This is a page for listing podcasts and other audio works that have their own hub page on the SCP wiki. This is distinct from the [[[Audio Adaptations]]] page, which lists readings of articles that remain completely faithful to the source material, without additions or subtractions. The following works are all SCP related, but include reviews, interviews and original audio dramas, although on-site hubs for audio readings by specific people are also linked.

This list aims to be comprehensive and so can be updated by any site member. Ideally, each link should have its own tagline written (or at least approved) by the Hub creator for each of the works.

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
+ Ongoing Podcasts
One-off recordings and podcasts that have not updated in the last year or are officially inactive can be moved to the Podcast and Audio Archive. 
* [[[discovering-scp-hub| Discovering SCP]]] - Veteran writer [[*user Tanhony]] and inexperienced newcomer [[*user DarnellJermaine]] read and discuss SCP articles.
* [[[findusalivehub| Find Us Alive Podcast Hub]]] - Scripted audiofiction podcast set after the [[[SCP-6320| disappearance of Site-107]]], written and produced by [[*user Raddagher]].
* [[[simply-creative-people-hub | Simply Creative People]]] - Simply Creative People is the podcast for SCP Creatives.  Two SCP authors ([[*user Grigori Karpin]] & [[*user HarryBlank]]) invite guests to discuss SCPs/tales/GOI formats they think are worth highlighting and their experiences as SCP fans/creators.
* [[[wttf-podcast-hub| Welcome To The Foundation]]] - Welcome To The XK, those of you lucky enough to be alive still. Hosted by Ex-Site Director Dr. Robin ([[*user The Akashain]]) and his team, in this SCP podcast, you'll be guided through the most horrific stories of the apocalypse and the time before it. Join them as they navigate through the wreckage, uncover secrets, and attempt to survive the unimaginable. Get ready for more SCPs, more on-the-ground action, more unexpected twists, and… more hot gossip?
* [[[reading-and-writing-club|Reading and Writing Club]]]: This is the official SCP reading club, run by the people in the SCP discord, we do weekly reading and analysis of articles, as well as seminars on writing. We record live on Sundays at a varieties of times.

[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
+ Podcast and Audio Archive
* [[[author-s-corner-podcast-hub| Author's Corner Podcast Hub]]] - The podcast directed and decided by the SCP community.
* [[[fam-radio-hub| Foundation After Midnight Radio Hub]]] - The only after midnight radio broadcast for the Foundation, by the Foundation.
* [[[kaktuskast-hub|KaktusKast Hub]]] - [[*user djkaktus]] interviews various members of the SCP community.
* [[[object-class-podcast|Object Class: Podcast]]] - [[*user A Random Day]] and [[*user Captain Kirby]] argue with each other about the art and craft of writing for the SCP Wiki, covering topics from creating GOIs to the importance of verisimilitude.
* [[*user Randomini]] - The inclusion of the following pages on this hub was almost certainly a mistake.
 * [[[randomini-does-the-mouth-word-things| Randomini Does The Mouth Word Things For Benefit Of The Eyeless, Illiterate And Terminally Bored]]]
 * [[[advent-calendar-2015| Randomini Continues Talking Despite The Best Efforts Of Almost Everyone He Knows: Advent Calendar Edition v2015]]] 
 * [[[ttrimmd|The Thing That Randomini Is Making Me Do]]]
 * [[[advent-calendar-2017|The War On Christmas With Death Tolls In The Billions: Randomini's Grand Decemberween Advent Talkstravaganza v2017]]]
* [[[SCP Café Hub]]] - [[*user pxdnbluesoul]] recaps and analyses recently published SCP articles.
* [[[SCP Play Podcast Hub]]] - A tabletop RPG running a Monster of the Week Campaign based off the SCP Universe.
* [[[TF Alpha-440]]] - An early collaborative project to produce SCP-based audio dramas.
* [[[tpias-hub|Three Ports in a Storm -- Podcast Hub]]] - A ragtag group of misfits and meddlers, operating in secret without official backing or authority, have been recruited to help fix Three Portlands.
* [[[The Scip Squad Podcast Hub]]] - An SCP author interview show where SCP authors and writer [[*user Tstaffor]] and [[*user Luxaiko]] have guests from across the SCP internet sphere on to talk about their favorite articles and even non-SCP related things.
* [[[theresacactusinthecorner|The SCP Foundation Podcast Hub]]] - An in-depth look at the complexities of the SCPverse.
* [[[echoes-of-the-end-the-last-safe-haven-hub|Echoes of the End: The Last Safe Haven]]]: A weekly audio fiction that airs on Sunday 5pm BST. Join Graves and find out if there's still a future worth fighting for, in this world shattered by the collapse of the SCP Foundation. Written/Voice and Produced by [[*user Zaxoosh]].
[[/div]]
